findings.title: An unintentionally large vesting period
findings.description: The `VestingEscrowSimple` contract can be initialized with an unintentionally large vesting period, i.e., by supplying a value denoted in milliseconds instead of seconds.

findings.title: Inaccurate value representation by the `locked` function after the `owner` revocation
findings.description: A vulnerability was discovered in the internal `_locked` function. If the `owner` revokes access and subsequently someone sends tokens to the contract, then the balance of the contract no longer reflects the remaining tokens available for claim.
